name: Lenny's Bad Dream
description:
Lenny played too much in the arcade room, his mom told him that playing too many video games was bad for him.

Of course, he didn't listen to her ... He is now out of coins and also he need to face 70's - 90's classics monsters from his favorite video games !
Is he in a video game ? Is he in a dream ? no time to decide ! Need to survive ! 
...
Oh I forgot ! Drinking soda can help you !

Lenny's Bad Dream is a 3D topdown where you play as a 90's teenager who played a bit too much and now has
to face a video games monsters during the night.
Survive as many waves as you can and use the soda to craft weapons to your advantage !

This game was made during the Curious Game Jam 2020
by Arthur "vincart" Joanin - Game/Level Design
   Kristofer "NysoS" Ledoux - Programmer
   Neal "Cyberebral" Finger - 3D Artist

/!\ Do not hesitate to use ZQSD or ARROWS to move due to controls manager problems.  /!\
